text: 1.3: Ef 1.9-10; 1 Te 2.4; 1 T 1.1; 1.11; 2.3; 2 T 1.10; Ta 2.10; 3.4Ana zumgum ana nduara mba tuga sarav, ana gumgi mbari farasegim, mbe mba buna vhuueŋ bun nzuai. Ana mba tɨva mbuav, ana za wo buna vhuueŋ ndi hiaŋ tɨgi. Fhe Bakɨme, ana taagiap nza ndi guma ma. Ana nzuaim, gu ana buna vhuueŋ bun nzuai ŋaara ndigi.
